text:
DigitalOcean | New York, Cambridge/Boston, Remote | Onsite/Remote | Visa

The Data & Analytics team is looking for Senior Data Engineers. You'd have to be in New York or be willing to relocate (DO provides relocation). Feel free to shoot me an email if you're interested. You can find the email in my profile.

We're always looking for engineers and product folks. Check out our careers page: https://www.digitalocean.com/company/careers/
